scripts.index:ya: npx indexnow-submit submit-urls urls.txt --host extractaudioapp.com --engine yandex.com --key 310407653a608d4d
scripts.index:bing: npx indexnow-submit submit-urls urls.txt --host extractaudioapp.com --engine bing.com --key 310407653a608d4d
scripts.index:now: npm run index:ya && npm run index:bing
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m 'wip' && git push origin main
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run validate && npm run sitemap && npm run push
